description: We have one of the shortest holiday shopping seasons upon us. Retailers couldn't be more worried. And a look at two people who are working this Thanksgiving day.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, November 28, 2013
contentencoded:
Thanksgiving comes later than usual this year -- and retailers are panicking.

Going to work today -- not everyone is bummed about it.

Happy Thanksgiving!
title: PODCAST: Why are retailers worried this holiday season?
teaser: We have one of the shortest holiday shopping seasons upon us. Retailers couldn't be more worried. And a look at two people who are working this Thanksgiving day.
